attributes.action: The Government to Fund Mesothelioma Research
attributes.additional_details: The Government is saving millions of pounds under the provisions of the Mesothelioma Act, and these savings should be used for mesothelioma research purposes.
attributes.background: Tens of thousands of people have died in the UK from mesothelioma and tens of thousands more will die in the future from it. UK Governments' have a lamentable record on providing research funding that could give victims the chance of life.  It is time to stop writing victims off - give them hope.
